EdTellAboutLife.Hero: That fateful day when I met Ari...
Five years have already passed, and I still clearly remember the evening after which my life began to change.
To be honest, I can't even believe that everything has changed so suddenly, because now I have friends, a new position at work and a wonderful girl with whom I want to connect my life.
All obsessive thoughts about death, that my life is useless disappeared.
I let go of the past and thanks to Ari I began to appreciate the present, to try for the future.
It's never too late to start living for real.
